content: Søren Knudsen - IT-University of Copenhagen Søren Knudsen PhD, MSc Eng Associate Professor, Human-Computer Interaction and DesignAcademic Responsible, HDI Lab https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8306-1102 Emailsoeknitudk 20082023 Research activity per year Personal profile Current positionSøren Knudsen is an Assistant Professor at the Digital Design Department at the IT University of Copenhagen and a Marie Curie Postdoctoral scholar at the Department of Computer Science, University of Copenhagen.Research areasSøren Knudsen's research focuses on information visualization and human-computer interaction. He is interested in supporting people in understanding, making sense of, and discussing data in face-to-face and online contexts, for example supported by large or multiple displays and social media.
